root.description: Merges given reports (qacli-views) and add the sources were the violations were found.

UNIFY_REPORT_OUTPUT.description: Absolute or relative path to the merged reports output file.

UNIFY_REPORT_TYPE.description: Either 'qac' or 'coverity' defining which kind of reports shall be merged

UNIFY_REPORT_VARIANT_INPUT.description: List of absolute or relative paths to input reports files (qacli views), which shall be merged and their source information shall be added. Absolute or relative path of file cotaining a list of input report files.
